info.title: Account Manager Class
info.description: Singleton class for managing the drovio account.

const.name: ID_TEAM_NAME
const.description: The system team name for the identity database.

method.name: getInstance
method.description: Get an account instance.

method.name: authenticate
method.description: Authenticates an account with the given username and password.

parameter.name: $username
parameter.description: The account username. Email is also supported.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: login
method.description: Login the account using the drovio identity.

parameter.name: $rememberme
parameter.description: Whether to remember the user or not. Duration: 1 month.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on authentication failure.

method.name: updateSession
method.description: Update the current account session and renew cookies if necessary.

method.name: getAccountID
method.description: Gets the current logged in account id.

method.name: getMX
method.description: Gets the current mx id.

method.name: getSessionID
method.description: Gets the account session id.

method.name: getPersonID
method.description: Gets the person id of the logged in account.

method.name: logout
method.description: Logout the account from the system. Delete active session. Delete cookies.

method.name: validate
method.description: Validates if the user is logged in.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: resetPassword
method.description: Update the account's password given the reset id token.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: getAccountFolder
method.description: Gets the account's folder. The folder is created if doesn't exist.

parameter.name: $accountID
parameter.description:
The account id to get the folder for.
NOTICE: This doesn't work when in secure mode.

method.returndescription: The account folder path. If there is no active account, it returns FALSE.

method.name: getProfileUrl
method.description: Get a file's url relative to the account's profile.

parameter.name: $accountID
parameter.description: The account id. Leave empty for the current account. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: The profile file url. NULL if the file doesn't exist.

method.name: getServicesFolder
method.description: Get a service's folder inside the account root folder.

parameter.name: $systemAppData
parameter.description: This indicates the service folder as System App and will be placed in a special folder. It is FALSE by default.

method.name: info
method.description: Gets the account info.

parameter.name: $accountID
parameter.description: The account id to get the information for. Leave empty for the current account. It is empty by default. If it's not the current account, only public information will be returned.

method.returndescription: Returns an array of the account information.

method.name: updateProfileImage
method.description: Update the account profile image.

parameter.name: $image
parameter.description: The image data. The image should be in png format.

parameter.name: $accountID
parameter.description: The account id. If empty or in secure mode this will be the current account. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: removeAccount
method.description: Remove the current account from the system. The application will not run in secure mode.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: __construct
method.description: Create a new account instance for the platform identity.

method.name: getAccountSessionInstance
method.description: Get an accountSession instance for the current account.

method.name: getAccountFolderPath
method.description: Get the account folder path for any account.

parameter.name: $accountID
parameter.description: The account to get the folder path for.

method.name: getFolderID
method.description: Gets the unique folder id for the requested use.

parameter.name: $extension
parameter.description: The extension of the folder (if any).

method.name: getParentInstance
method.description: Get an IDAccount instance to act as 'parent'. This function is for compatibility reasons, to get from static to singleton.
